author: vargasa
body:
This set of commits only affects the plotting side of the module (i.e it doesn't touch the data itself). `TrackerMaterialBudgeComparison.C` functionality has been integrated into `MaterialBudget.py`, the main reason for these changes is to make things clearer and organized. 

* Every geometry ROOT file will have its geometry label and won't impose the renaming  of `_old` `_new` ambiguous labels previously used. That was always confusing after the third time testing geometry you never knew which one was `_old` and what exactly was `_new`. 

* Some reusable code on `MaterialBudget.py` has been collected into functions to avoid code redundancy. @rovere If you can do a review of this we will greatly appreciate it. 

* Some labels on the plots were restored to make it consistent with existent twiki documentation.

* Overlapping issues on previous plots were addressed.

For details please check commit description
title: Validation/Geometry: Integrate geometry comparison to MaterialBudget.py
